metadata.title: Sample Research Works Dataset
metadata.description: Synthetic bibliographic dataset for API development exercises

works.title: Machine Learning Approaches to Climate Prediction
works.abstract: This paper presents novel machine learning approaches for predicting regional climate patterns. We demonstrate that ensemble methods combining deep learning with traditional statistical models achieve superior accuracy on decadal prediction tasks.

works.title: Deep Learning in Genomics: A Comprehensive Survey
works.abstract: We survey recent advances in applying deep learning to genomic data analysis. Topics covered include sequence classification, variant calling, gene expression prediction and protein structure inference.

works.title: Natural Language Processing for Scientific Literature
works.abstract: This work explores the application of transformer-based language models to scientific text mining. We introduce a domain-adapted BERT model trained on 10 million research abstracts.

works.title: Reproducibility in Computational Biology
works.abstract: We examine reproducibility challenges in computational biology and propose a framework for containerised, version-controlled analysis pipelines that ensure long-term reproducibility.

works.title: Graph Neural Networks for Molecular Property Prediction
works.abstract: We present a novel graph neural network architecture for predicting molecular properties from chemical structures. Our approach achieves state-of-the-art results on benchmark datasets.
works.journal: Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling

works.title: Statistical Methods for Single-Cell RNA Sequencing
works.abstract: This review covers statistical methods for analysing single-cell RNA sequencing data, including normalisation, dimensionality reduction, clustering and differential expression testing.

works.title: Federated Learning for Healthcare Data
works.abstract: We explore federated learning approaches that enable collaborative model training across healthcare institutions whilst preserving patient privacy and data sovereignty.

works.title: Causal Inference in Observational Studies
works.abstract: This paper reviews modern approaches to causal inference from observational data, including propensity score methods, instrumental variables and difference-in-differences designs.

works.title: Quantum Computing for Optimisation Problems
works.abstract: We analyse the potential of near-term quantum computers for solving combinatorial optimisation problems, comparing quantum approximate optimisation algorithms with classical approaches.

works.title: Large Language Models for Code Generation
works.abstract: This study evaluates the capabilities of large language models for automated code generation across multiple programming languages and task complexities.

works.title: Biodiversity Monitoring with Remote Sensing
works.abstract: We demonstrate how satellite and drone-based remote sensing can be combined with machine learning to monitor biodiversity at landscape scales.

works.title: Interpretable Machine Learning for Healthcare
works.abstract: This paper reviews methods for building interpretable machine learning models in healthcare settings, where model transparency is essential for clinical adoption.

works.title: Time Series Forecasting with Transformers
works.abstract: We introduce a transformer architecture specifically designed for multivariate time series forecasting, achieving significant improvements on standard benchmarks.

works.title: Privacy-Preserving Data Analysis Techniques
works.abstract: This survey covers privacy-preserving techniques for statistical analysis, including differential privacy, secure multi-party computation and homomorphic encryption.

works.title: Network Analysis of Social Media Discourse
works.abstract: We apply network analysis methods to understand information flow and community formation in social media discussions around scientific topics.

works.title: Reinforcement Learning for Robotic Manipulation
works.abstract: This work presents advances in reinforcement learning algorithms for robotic manipulation tasks, demonstrating sample-efficient learning of complex motor skills.

works.title: Data Visualisation for Scientific Communication
works.abstract: We provide guidelines for effective data visualisation in scientific publications, emphasising accessibility, clarity and honest representation of uncertainty.

works.title: Bayesian Methods in Ecology
works.abstract: This tutorial introduces Bayesian statistical methods for ecological research, covering model specification, prior selection and posterior interpretation.

works.title: Ethical Considerations in AI Research
works.abstract: We examine ethical frameworks for AI research, discussing issues of fairness, accountability, transparency and societal impact.

works.title: Computational Approaches to Drug Repurposing
works.abstract: This review examines computational methods for identifying new therapeutic uses of existing drugs, including network-based approaches and machine learning models.
